Of the lavvfnluess [sic] of the oath of allegiance to the king, and of the other oath to his supremacy. Written for the benefit of Quakers and others, who out of scruple of conscience, refuse the oath of allegiance, and supremacy. / By Theophilus Brabourn. Brabourne, Theophilus, b. 1590.
[2], 5, [1] p.
Printed for the author, [London] : 1661.
Place of publication from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "march. 18", "1660"; imprint date crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
